descriptionlist.longdescription:
In App Purchase: $3.99

In-App Settings:
‚Ä¢ To open settings, go to the Profile tab and tap the ‚öôÔ∏è Gear icon next to your Instagram name ‚Äî or long-press the Home button / Instagram logo.
‚Ä¢ Download videos from Posts, IGTV, Reels, and DMs (HD / SD).
‚Ä¢ Save images from Posts, Stories, private DMs, and Profiles.
‚Ä¢ Block all promo ads in Feed, Stories, and Reels.
‚Ä¢ Quick Seen / Unseen toggle for Stories and DMs.
‚Ä¢ Ghost Typing mode.
‚Ä¢ Disable screenshot prevention in DMs.
‚Ä¢ Hide tabs such as Explore, Reels, and Create.
‚Ä¢ Keep unsent messages visible.
‚Ä¢ Icon theme change.
‚Ä¢ Fake location.
‚Ä¢ Copy text from Comments, Descriptions, and Bios.
‚Ä¢ Add confirmation prompts before liking, commenting, calling, or reposting.
‚Ä¢ And many more customization options...
‚Ä¢ Supports iPadOS.
